mapper.insert:
select popup_seq.nextval from dual
insert into popup (admin_code, popup_name, width, height, left, top, usage, popup_code, end_day, start_day ) values(#{adminCode}, #{popupName}, #{width}, #{height}, #{left}, #{top}, #{usage}, #{popupCode}, #{endDay}, #{startDay})
mapper.select: select * from popup order by end_day
